DOC.brief_summary: The aim work prediction fetal macrosomia measuring : 1 . HbA1C . 2 . Umbilical cord thickness . 3 . Interventricular septum thickness .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Umbilical Cord Thickness Prediction Fetal Macrosomia Patients With Gestational Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective case control study carry Ain sham university maternity hospital April 2015 October 2015 80 patient . The patient divide two group , 40 pregnant woman case group gestational diabetes mellitus 40 non diabetic pregnant woman control group approve local hospital ethic research committee . A verbal consent take patient . The following investigation perform : 1 . Calculation gestational age base last reliable menstrual period ultrasound examination within first trimester . The ultrasound examination Voluson E6 equip 3.5 Hz trans-abdominal probe fetal medicine unit maternity hospital Ain Shams University . 2 . Ultrasound examination perform twice 27-28 week 36-37 week gestation prospectively . During ultrasound , fetal biometry ( biparietal diameter , abdominal circumference , femur length ) estimate fetal weight calculate automatically accord hadlock 's formula additionally , sonographic cross sectional area umbilical cord , umbilical artery umbilical vein measure free loop umbilical cord use software ultrasound device . The cross sectional area Wharton 's jelly compute subtract cross sectional area vessel umbilical cord interventricular septum thickness measure . 3 . HbA1c level measure diabetes patient . All patient subject : 1 . Full history take include last menstrual period , medical history past obstetric history . 2 . Detailed general physical history examination obstetrics examination . 3 . Ultrasound examination fetal medicine unit maternity hospital Ain sham university . 4 . Venous blood sample take patient gestational diabetes mellitus clinical pathology department Ain Shams University , measure level HbA1c use immunoassay technique . The patient follow till delivery . The neonate weigh fetal macrosomia diagnose fetal weight 4 kg .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Singleton gestation . 2 . Gestational age 27 week . 3 . Intact membrane . 4 . Normal umbilical morphology ( two artery one vein ) . 5 . Diagnosis gestational diabetes . 1 . The presence fetal congenital anomaly . 2 . Multifetal pregnancy . 3 . Maternal chronic disease ( hypertension , renal disease , cardiac pulmonary disease , etc. ) . 4 . Patients diagnosis oligohydramnios , preeclampsia intrauterine growth retardation . 5 . Patients use cigarette alcohol pregnancy .
